channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#0965; 02:51PM; 830 W Pacific Coast Hw; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AngNoj; #HarborCity; Firefighters arrived to find a two-vehicle collision with one person trapped. After quickly extricating the trapped patient and identifying a total of three injured, two were transported to a local hospital and one declined transport/further care. Unknown age/gender/condition. LAPD Inc #2410. Nothing further.; FS 85; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E285 E36 E38 EM13 HR3 RA112 RA38 RA85 T38 T85; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Rescue; INC#0767; 12:23PM; 10599 N Haines Canyon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/40s3my0; #Tujunga; One 34-year-old male with upper extremity injuries, reportedly related to a mountain bike crash. LAFD Air Operations hoisted the patient from their remote location and transported them by air to a local trauma center. Nothing further.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E274 H2 HA2 RA74 RA874 RH114 T74; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0583; 10:21AM; Santa Monica Mountains; MAP: https://bit.ly/41nvSSJ; #PacificPalisades; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to a 64 year-old male hiker who sustained an ankle injury on a remote section of the Josepho Spur Trail west of the Murphy Ranch Stables. Though information from the 9-1-1 caller was limited, an LAFD Rescue Helicopter was able to find the man and lower an LAFD Flight Paramedic to begin initial care and injury stabilization. Given the remote location, the injured man will soon be hoisted aboard the still hovering LAFD Rescue Helicopter for continuing care during direct helicopter transport to an area hospital.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 BP19 E19 E269 H2 H5 HA2 HA5 RA19 RH114 T69; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1041; 03:01PM; 336 N Ogden Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/41xFESk; #Fairfax; 45 Firefighters took just 24 minutes to access, confine and extinguish stubborn flames among a trio of carports, possibly involving one or more vehicles. Firefighters prevented the flames from extending to nearby residential structures. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E203 E227 E229 E27 E294 E41 E5 E52 E61 E89 EA1 EM5 HR3 RA68 RA827 T27 T29 T3 T94 UR3 UR88; CH7; 15 16; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1041; 02:27PM; 336 N Ogden Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/41xFESk; #Fairfax; PRELIM: At least three residential carports well involved with fire.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC11 E227 E229 E27 E41 E5 E61 RA68 T27 T29; CH9; 15; Brian Humphrey

Water Rescue; INC#0640; 10:34AM; Des Moines Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/3mRBmpV; #PorterRanch; PRELIM: Four year-old male twins were discovered unresponsive in the backyard pool of their home. As LAFD Firefighter/Dispatchers provided telephone CPR guidance. LAFD Firefighter/Paramedics quickly arrived to continue advanced life support, promptly transporting the pair (one in critical condition, the other in grave condition) and their parents to a regional Pediatric Trauma Center. The Mayor's Crisis Response Team was summoned to assist the family and neighbors. No further details are available at this time.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E107 E70 E8 E87 EM15 EM17 RA106 RA72; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Aircraft Emergency; INC#0518; 09:29AM; Van Nuys Airport; MAP: https://bit.ly/3iOnwOG; #VanNuys; PRELIM: Solo aircraft (unknown type or circumstances) reportedly struck or breached a fence. No fire. No injury. No further details. Media Inquiries: Van Nuys Airport operations.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 CR114 E103 E273 E90 F114 RA100 RA896 T73; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown Structure Fire; INC#1697; 09:53PM; 2921 E 8th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3H1iQSL; #BoyleHeights; First arriving 30 LAFD Firefighters took just 19 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish flames in (the basement area? of) a two-story building containing a pair top floor apartments above a neighborhood market. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E17 E2 E202 E209 E210 E9 EM1 RA17 RA25 SQ21 T10 T2 T9; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1697; 09:34PM; 2921 E 8th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3H1iQSL; #BoyleHeights; PRELIM: Fire in (the basement area? of) a two-story apartments over commercial (neighborhood market) building.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E17 E2 E202 E209 E210 E9 EM1 RA17 RA25 T10 T2 T9; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Fatality Traffic Collision; INC#0337; 07:37AM; EB 10 Fwy west of Manning Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ag1y0k; #Palms; PRELIM: Solo sedan off the roadway into a tree. Heavily damaged vehicle with one male deceased at scene. No other injuries reported. This incident may have occurred one or more days ago, and was possibly delayed in being reported to 9-1-1. No further details. Media Inquiries: CHP (Logs #29/ #586) and Coroner (Case #2023-04197).; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; E43 RA43; CH4; Brian Humphrey
